Name: Simnetzero
About the game: SimNetZero is a realistic turn based simulation that allows you to progress into the future to the year 2050, and transform the world's energy sectors to renewable sources. You select projects and technology, build factories and subsidize alternative fuels and Electric Vehicles. The game uses real life projects and economics. All technologies presented in the game are in some stage of development at this time, you can act as a tycoon and champion new technology. If you ever wondered about what you'd do with 10% of the worlds yearly energy investment, now is your chance to try. Perhaps you can help the world reach Net Zero energy emissions by 2050!
